label: atmosphericPressure
comment: Observed air (atmospheric or barometric) pressure.

label: illuminance
comment: Observed instantaneous ambient light intensity.

label: precipitation
comment: Observed precipitation/rainfall level over a given duration.

label: relativeHumidity
comment: Observed instantaneous relative humidity (water vapour in air).

label: windSpeed
comment: Observed wind speed.

label: windDirection
comment: Observed wind directiont. Measured in degrees clockwise from due north.

label: weatherType
comment: Observed weather type or status. Represented by a comma separated list of weather types, e.g., cloudy, sunny etc.

label: dewPoint
comment: Observed  temperature to which air must be cooled to become saturated with water vapor.

label: solarRadiation
comment: Observed solar radiation.

label: airTemperature
comment: Observed value of air temperature. Value is an object containing attributes representing statistical aggregates derived from past data.

label: gustSpeed
comment: A sudden burst of high-speed wind over the observed average wind speed lasting  only for a few seconds.

label: airQualityIndex
comment: Overall Air Quality Index (AQI) for the observed air quality.

label: aqiMajorPollutant
comment: Major pollutant in the Air Quality Index (AQI).

label: observationDateTime
comment: Last reported time of observation.

label: aqiMajorPollutantForecast
comment: Forecasted major air pollutant in the Air Quality Index (AQI) over a certain duration in future.

label: airQualityIndexForecast
comment: Forecasted overall Air Quality Index (AQI) over a certain duration in future.

label: precipitationForecast
comment: Forecasted rainfall over a certain duration in future.

label: relativeHumidityForecast
comment: Forecasted relative humidity (water vapour in air) over a certain duration in future.

label: airTemperatureForecast
comment: Forecasted value of air temperature over a certain duration in future.

label: localeInfo
comment: Locale information corresponding to this observation.

label: dayLength
comment: The period of solar radiation in a day corresponding to this observation.

label: season
comment: Represents specific time of the year that has distinct weather patterns and conditions, such as summer, autumn (fall), etc.
